title: Candidate Care Program - LifeLink
html: Candidate Care Program
description: Candidate Care Program Empowering Healthcare Professionals with Support, Growth, and Opportunity. Candidate Care is simply how you treat the candidates and the respect you give to them and their time. We at My Staff Need Engage and Value long term relationship with candidates under our ‘Retain & Rehire’ program. Our team identified several benefits to employing people with disabilities (PWDs), including an expanded hiring pool, positive psychosocial impacts of retention of PWDs on employees with or without disabilities, and increased diversity of the workplace. We value diverse talent and cultivate inclusion. Our recruiters have set goals and targets to recruit diverse talent. We believe diverse teams give a Sense of Belongingness and keep connected/engaged to company’s environment. As part of My Staff Need screening criteria, we analyze each client’s requirement for job search. Our team has professional approach to screen the resumes without any biasness as well as work closely with the candidates to develop long term relations with them. Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/candidate-care2-1.mp4 We analyze all the factors like competitive compensation or flexible work schedule(100% remote or hybrid) for the candidates which helps to find best match for their roles. We promote open communication and collaboration by scheduling periodic follow ups with candidates (pre & post onboarding). As we build the relationship with candidates there is more transparent, productive, and happier workplace, and therefore, Higher Retention Rates. Pay attention to Feedback, sending out surveys to candidates and asking for feedback to understand candidate’s perspective and needs. We work with our client’s hiring team to help them modify their Recruitment and Retention Strategies, developing disability inclusion mediations, personalizing workplace and workspace modifications for PWDs, and matching the needs and skills of PWDs with the needs of the company, company leadership and human resources (HR) professionals can create disability inclusive mindsets by creating positive social attitudes Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/care3-1.mp4 My Staff Need Referral Program Help someone find a job and earn rewards in the process.
